body.title: lol
body.description:
dang you actually beat that mage. well that's great. because all the other mages are exactly the same as that one. 
 In fact, there is really only one mage. 
so, i think your path might be totally clear for the rest of the way. 
 ok fine, ill do something stupid, and just hard code in enemy regeneration
you can thank me later
also, you might have noticed that the mage was really stupid
ill fix that later too
anyways, see yah after you get the next enemy (please don't die, I think the code will seg fault;))
